modules.description: Provides binary serialization and deserialization functions for the Bitvec.t type, including size calculation, writing, reading, and shape definition. Supports polymorphic variants through a constructor tag reader and includes type-class interfaces for seamless integration with Bin_prot. Used to extend existing interfaces with binary capabilities without type duplication errors.

Provides bitwise operations for manipulating binary vectors, including packing and unpacking values into and from byte sequences. Works with arbitrary-length bit vectors and standard OCaml types such as integers and strings. Used to serialize and deserialize structured data in binary formats for network communication and file storage.

Serializes and deserializes Bitvec.t values using Binprot, with support for size calculation, writing, reading, and shape definition. Offers polymorphic variant handling via constructor tag readers and type-class interfaces for seamless integration. Operations include binary encoding, decoding, and shape-aware processing. Examples include storing bit vectors in binary files and transmitting them over networks with type-safe deserialization.
